t: Amazon.com : Maltesers - Regular Box - 100g (Case of 16) : Grocery & Gourmet Food
s: So happy to find proper Maltesers, from the UK/Ireland. The USA made ones are all wrong, just like American chocolate. I bought a pack of 16 small boxes and I don't think they will last long. I will be back for more! ... Delivery time was quick. 10/12 vs estimated time of 10/21 to 11/5. Chocolate was not melted or crushed, but the order was 3 boxes short (13 of 16). The malted milk balls were light and tasty with no chocolate 'rocks' like like some local brands...

t: Amazon.com : Maltesers Fun Size, 195 g : Grocery & Gourmet Food
s: Excellent value, not quite as cheap per 100g as the box but the boxes have now sold out. These packets are still one of the cheapest sources including via Tesco. Not much I can say about the maltesers - they are so well known. With their crispy centre they are one of my favourite chocs.
